data.name: Bank Guarantee
data.description: The Bank Guarantee is used for Commercial Lending primarily to support conditions that may be required to satisfy a contract. This product removes the need for members to pay out funds to vendors, allowing them to hold the funds or property as security while still earning interest.

features.additionalInfo: No minimum amount or maximum term, remains in place for length of the contract.
Secure by property or term savings.

eligibility.additionalInfo: This product is not available to non-business customers.
Product is available to approved borrowers only. Terms, conditions, fees, charges and normal lending criteria apply.
As a customer-owned bank, customers must also become a shareholder of Regional Australia Bank to be eligible to open an account.

fees.name: Commercial Fees & Charges apply
fees.additionalInfo: Contact our Commercial Lending Team for details
